| History                 = The [[Norman Osborn (Earth-616)|Green Goblin]] proposed Cosmos Productions to film a movie starring him, the [[Enforcers (Earth-616)|Enforcers]] and [[Spider-Man (Peter Parker)|Spider-Man]]. Since it was actually just a ruse to lure Spider-Man into a trap, after reaching a deserted area in [[New Mexico (State)|New Mexico]] where the movie was to be filmed, the Green Goblin flew away, Spider-Man vanished and the [[United States Army (Earth-616)|Army]] turned the Enforcers over to the police, although [[B. J. Kosmojian (Earth-616)|B.J. Cosmos]] attempted to sign the [[Bruce Banner (Earth-616)|Hulk]] for another movie.{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 1 #14}}
